mapper.update: UPDATE anbiao_jiashiyuan SET isdelete = 1 where id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT a.*,b.dept_name deptName FROM anbiao_jiashiyuan a inner join blade_dept b on a.dept_id = b.id WHERE 1=1 and ifnull(a.isdelete ,0) = 0 and a.id=#{id}

SELECT distinct id, jiashiyuanxingming, case when xingbie = 1 then '男' when xingbie = 2 then '女' else xingbie end as xingbie, '' as ruzhiriqi, shenfenzhenghao, '' as zhiwei, congyezigezheng, (select dict_value from blade_dict where is_deleted = 0 and `code` = 'congyezigezhengleibie' and dict_key = congyeleibie limit 1) as congyeleibie, congyezhengchulingri, congyezhengyouxiaoqi, shoujihaoma, '' as cheliangpaizhao, (select dept_name from blade_dept where id = dept_id and is_deleted = 0 limit 1) as deptName FROM anbiao_jiashiyuan WHERE 1=1 AND isdelete = 0
AND dept_id= #{deptId}

select b.id,b.dept_id,b.cheliangpaizhao,b.chepaiyanse,b.shiyongxingzhi from anbiao_cheliang_jiashiyuan a, ( select id,dept_id,cheliangpaizhao,chepaiyanse,shiyongxingzhi from anbiao_vehicle where is_deleted = 0 ) b where 1=1 and a.vehid = b.id and a.jiashiyuanid = #{jiashiyuanid}
mapper.update: UPDATE anbiao_jiashiyuan SET denglumima = #{password} where id = #{id}

if.test: orderColumn != null and orderColumn != '' and order != 0

mapper.select: select DISTINCT id, jiashiyuanxingming, xingbie, jiashiyuanleixing, shenfenzhenghao, shoujihaoma from anbiao_jiashiyuan where isdelete = 0 AND dept_id= #{deptId}
mapper.insert:
insert into anbiao_jiashiyuan
id,
dept_id,
shenfenzhengchulingriqi,
shenfenzhengyouxiaoqi,
jiashizhenghao,
tijianriqi,
jiashiyuanxingming,
xingbie,
shenfenzhenghao,
nianling,
zhunjiachexing,
congyezigezheng,
congyeleibie,
congyezhengchulingri,
congyezhengyouxiaoqi,
chengxinkaoheshijian,
xiacichengxinkaoheshijian,
jiashizhengchulingriqi,
jiashizhengyouxiaoqi,
fazhengjiguan,
jiatingzhuzhi,
chushengshijian,
shoujihaoma,
denglumima,
jiashiyuanleixing,
congyerenyuanleixing,
isdelete,
createtime,
caozuoren,
caozuoshijian,
caozuorenid
#{id},
#{deptId},
#{shenfenzhengchulingriqi},
#{shenfenzhengyouxiaoqi},
#{jiashizhenghao},
#{tijianriqi},
#{jiashiyuanxingming},
#{xingbie},
#{shenfenzhenghao},
#{nianling},
#{zhunjiachexing},
#{congyezigezheng},
#{congyeleibie},
#{congyezhengchulingri},
#{congyezhengyouxiaoqi},
#{chengxinkaoheshijian},
#{xiacichengxinkaoheshijian},
#{jiashizhengchulingriqi},
#{jiashizhengyouxiaoqi},
#{fazhengjiguan},
#{jiatingzhuzhi},
#{chushengshijian},
#{shoujihaoma},
#{denglumima},
#{jiashiyuanleixing},
#{congyerenyuanleixing},
#{isdelete},
#{createtime},
#{caozuoren},
#{caozuoshijian},
#{caozuorenid}
mapper.update:
update anbiao_jiashiyuan
dept_id = #{deptId},
jiashiyuanxingming = #{jiashiyuanxingming},
xingbie = #{xingbie},
shenfenzhenghao = #{shenfenzhenghao},
nianling = #{nianling},
zhunjiachexing = #{zhunjiachexing},
congyezigezheng = #{congyezigezheng},
congyeleibie = #{congyeleibie},
congyezhengchulingri = #{congyezhengchulingri},
congyezhengyouxiaoqi = #{congyezhengyouxiaoqi},
chengxinkaoheshijian = #{chengxinkaoheshijian},
xiacichengxinkaoheshijian = #{xiacichengxinkaoheshijian},
jiashizhengchulingriqi = #{jiashizhengchulingriqi},
jiashizhengyouxiaoqi = #{jiashizhengyouxiaoqi},
fazhengjiguan = #{fazhengjiguan},
jiatingzhuzhi = #{jiatingzhuzhi},
chushengshijian = #{chushengshijian},
shoujihaoma = #{shoujihaoma},
denglumima = #{denglumima},
jiashiyuanleixing = #{jiashiyuanleixing},
congyerenyuanleixing = #{congyerenyuanleixing},
isdelete = #{isdelete},
caozuoren = #{caozuoren},
caozuoshijian = #{caozuoshijian},
caozuorenid = #{caozuorenid}
where dept_id = #{deptId} and jiashiyuanxingming = #{jiashiyuanxingming} and shenfenzhenghao = #{shenfenzhenghao} and jiashiyuanleixing = #{jiashiyuanleixing} and isdelete = 0
mapper.select: SELECT openid,jiashiyuanxingming,shoujihaoma FROM anbiao_jiashiyuan WHERE openid=#{param1} and isdelete = 0

select distinct id,jiashiyuanxingming,shenfenzhenghao,shoujihaoma from anbiao_jiashiyuan where isdelete = 0 and status = 0
AND dept_id = #{deptId}

select a.id,a.jiashiyuanxingming,a.shoujihaoma,a.dept_id as deptId,b.signatrue from anbiao_jiashiyuan a inner join anbiao_jiashiyuan_signatrue b on a.id = b.jiashiyuanid where a.isdelete = 0
AND a.dept_id= #{deptId}
SELECT max(CONVERT(dept_id,SIGNED)) AS id FROM anbiao_jiashiyuan
mapper.sql:
SELECT bb.dept_name deptName , a.jiashiyuanxingming as a, ruzhi_compeleted as a1, sfz_compeleted as a2, jsz_compeleted as a3, cyzgz_compeleted as a4, tj_compeleted as a5, gqpx_compeleted as a6, wzzm_compeleted as a7, aqzrs_compeleted as a8, whgzs_compeleted as a9, ldht_compeleted as a10, case when IFNULL(h.xsz_compeleted,'') = '' then 0 else h.xsz_compeleted end as b1, case when IFNULL(h.ysz_compeleted,'') = '' then 0 else h.ysz_compeleted end as b2, case when IFNULL(h.xnbg_compeleted,'') = '' then 0 else h.xnbg_compeleted end as b3, case when IFNULL(h.djzs_compeleted,'') = '' then 0 else h.djzs_compeleted end as b4, case when IFNULL(j.xsz_compeleted,'') = '' then 0 else j.xsz_compeleted end as b5, case when IFNULL(j.ysz_compeleted,'') = '' then 0 else j.ysz_compeleted end as b6, case when IFNULL(j.xnbg_compeleted,'') = '' then 0 else j.xnbg_compeleted end as b7, case when IFNULL(j.djzs_compeleted,'') = '' then 0 else j.djzs_compeleted end as b8, case when IFNULL(jsybx.ajb_insured_ids,'') = '' then 1 else 0 end as c1, case when IFNULL(k.avb_av_ids,'') = '' then 1 else 0 end as c2, case when IFNULL(i.avb_av_ids,'') = '' then 1 else 0 end as c3 FROM anbiao_jiashiyuan a inner join (
) bb on a.dept_id = bb.id LEFT JOIN anbiao_jiashiyuan_ruzhi o ON a.id = o.ajr_aj_ids AND o.ajr_delete = 0 LEFT JOIN anbiao_jiashiyuan_jiashizheng b ON a.id = b.ajj_aj_ids AND b.ajj_delete = 0 LEFT JOIN anbiao_jiashiyuan_congyezigezheng c ON a.id = c.ajc_aj_ids AND c.ajc_delete = 0 LEFT JOIN anbiao_jiashiyuan_tijian d ON a.id = d.ajt_aj_ids AND d.ajt_delete = 0 LEFT JOIN anbiao_jiashiyuan_gangqianpeixun e ON a.id = e.ajg_aj_ids AND e.ajg_delete = 0 LEFT JOIN anbiao_jiashiyuan_wuzezhengming f ON a.id = f.ajw_aj_ids AND f.ajw_delete = 0 LEFT JOIN anbiao_jiashiyuan_anquanzerenshu g ON a.id = g.aja_aj_ids AND g.aja_delete = 0 LEFT JOIN anbiao_jiashiyuan_weihaigaozhishu h ON a.id = h.ajw_aj_ids AND h.ajw_delete = 0 LEFT JOIN anbiao_jiashiyuan_laodonghetong i ON a.id = i.ajw_aj_ids AND i.ajw_delete = 0 LEFT JOIN ( SELECT xsz_compeleted,ysz_compeleted,xnbg_compeleted,jiashiyuanid,djzs_compeleted FROM anbiao_vehicle j LEFT JOIN anbiao_vehicle_xingshizheng k on j.id = k.avx_av_ids LEFT JOIN anbiao_vehicle_daoluyunshuzheng l on j.id = l.avd_av_ids LEFT JOIN anbiao_vehicle_xingnengbaogao m on j.id = m.avx_av_ids LEFT JOIN anbiao_vehicle_dengjizhengshu n on j.id = n.avd_vehicle_ids WHERE j.cheliangpaizhao like '%挂' and j.is_deleted = 0 and k.avx_delete = 0 and l.avd_delete = 0 and m.avx_delete = 0 and n.avd_delete = 0 ) j on a.id = j.jiashiyuanid LEFT JOIN ( SELECT xsz_compeleted,ysz_compeleted,xnbg_compeleted,jiashiyuanid,djzs_compeleted FROM anbiao_vehicle j LEFT JOIN anbiao_vehicle_xingshizheng k on j.id = k.avx_av_ids LEFT JOIN anbiao_vehicle_daoluyunshuzheng l on j.id = l.avd_av_ids LEFT JOIN anbiao_vehicle_xingnengbaogao m on j.id = m.avx_av_ids LEFT JOIN anbiao_vehicle_dengjizhengshu n on j.id = n.avd_vehicle_ids WHERE j.cheliangpaizhao not like '%挂' and j.is_deleted = 0 and k.avx_delete = 0 and l.avd_delete = 0 and m.avx_delete = 0 and n.avd_delete = 0 ) h on a.id = h.jiashiyuanid LEFT JOIN ( SELECT ajb_insured_ids, ajb_delete,ajb_insure_deptid FROM anbiao_jiashiyuan_baoxian where ajb_delete = 0 ) jsybx ON jsybx.ajb_insured_ids = a.id LEFT JOIN (SELECT avb_av_ids,jiashiyuanid FROM anbiao_vehicle j LEFT JOIN anbiao_vehicle_baoxian o on j.id = o.avb_av_ids WHERE j.cheliangpaizhao like '%挂' and o.avb_delete = 0 )i on a.id=i.jiashiyuanid LEFT JOIN (SELECT avb_av_ids,jiashiyuanid FROM anbiao_vehicle j LEFT JOIN anbiao_vehicle_baoxian o on j.id = o.avb_av_ids WHERE j.cheliangpaizhao not like '%挂' and o.avb_delete = 0 )k on a.id=k.jiashiyuanid WHERE ifnull( a.isdelete, 0 ) = 0 GROUP BY a.id

if.test: orderColumn != null and orderColumn != '' and order != 0

mapper.select: select a.id, a.shenfenzhengfujian as sfzzmimg, a.shenfenzhengfanmianfujian as sfzfmimg, b.ajr_ids as ruzhiid, b.ajr_head_portrait as ruzhiimg, c.ajj_ids as jszid, c.ajj_front_photo_address as jszzmimg, c.ajj_attached_photos as jszfmimg, d.ajc_ids as cyzid, d.ajc_licence as cyzimg, e.ajt_ids as tjid, e.ajt_enclosure as tjimg, f.ajg_ids as gqid, f.ajg_training_enclosure as gqimg, g.ajw_ids as wzzmid, g.ajw_enclosure as wzzmimg, h.ajt_ids as qtid, h.ajt_enclosure as qtimg from anbiao_jiashiyuan a left join anbiao_jiashiyuan_ruzhi b on a.id = b.ajr_aj_ids and b.ajr_delete = 0 left join anbiao_jiashiyuan_jiashizheng c on a.id = c.ajj_aj_ids and c.ajj_delete = 0 left join anbiao_jiashiyuan_congyezigezheng d on a.id = d.ajc_aj_ids and d.ajc_delete = 0 left join anbiao_jiashiyuan_tijian e on a.id = e.ajt_aj_ids and e.ajt_delete = 0 left join anbiao_jiashiyuan_gangqianpeixun f on a.id = f.ajg_aj_ids and f.ajg_delete = 0 left join anbiao_jiashiyuan_wuzezhengming g on a.id = g.ajw_aj_ids and g.ajw_delete = 0 left join anbiao_jiashiyuan_qita h on a.id = h.ajt_aj_ids and h.ajt_delete = 0 where a.isdelete = 0 and a.id = #{jsyId}

SELECT a.dept_id AS deptId, h.dept_name AS deptName, a.id AS jiashiyuanId, a.jiashiyuanxingming, b.ajr_head_portrait AS ajrHeadPortrait, IFNULL( a.xingbie, '1' ) AS xingbie, IFNULL( b.ajr_nation, '' ) AS nation, IFNULL( b.ajr_native_place, '' ) AS nativePlace, IFNULL( b.ajr_birth, '' ) AS birth, IFNULL( b.ajr_age, '0' ) AS age, IFNULL( b.ajr_political_outlook, '' ) AS politicalOutlook, IFNULL( b.ajr_education, '' ) AS ajrEducation, IFNULL( b.ajr_graduation_school, '' ) AS ajrGraduationSchool, IFNULL( b.ajr_graduation_date, '' ) AS ajrGraduationDate, IFNULL( b.ajr_id_number, '' ) AS ajrIdNumber, IFNULL( b.ajr_address, '' ) AS ajrAddress, IFNULL( b.ajr_receive_driving_license, '' ) AS ajrReceiveDrivingLicense, IFNULL( b.ajr_class, '' ) AS ajrClass, IFNULL( b.ajr_driving_experience, '' ) AS ajrDrivingExperience, IFNULL( b.ajr_health_status, '' ) AS ajrHealthStatus, IFNULL( b.ajr_work_experience, '' ) AS ajrWorkExperience, IFNULL( b.ajr_safe_driving_record1, '' ) AS ajrSafeDrivingRecord1, IFNULL( b.ajr_safe_driving_record2, '' ) AS ajrSafeDrivingRecord2, IFNULL( b.ajr_safe_driving_record3, '' ) AS ajrSafeDrivingRecord3, IFNULL( b.ajr_physical_examination_results, '' ) AS ajrPhysicalExaminationResults, IFNULL( b.ajr_integrity_assessment_results, '' ) AS ajrIntegrityAssessmentResults, IFNULL( a.shenfenzhengfujian, '' ) AS shenfenzhengfujian, IFNULL( a.shenfenzhengfanmianfujian, '' ) AS shenfenzhengfanmianfujian, IFNULL( c.ajj_front_photo_address, '' ) AS ajjFrontPhotoAddress, IFNULL( c.ajj_attached_photos, '' ) AS ajjAttachedPhotos, IFNULL( d.ajc_licence, '' ) AS ajcLicence, IFNULL( e.ajt_enclosure, '' ) AS ajtEnclosure, IFNULL( f.ajg_training_enclosure, '' ) AS ajgTrainingEnclosure, IFNULL( g.ajw_enclosure, '' ) AS ajwEnclosure, IFNULL( i.aja_autograph_enclosure, '' ) AS ajaAutographEnclosure, IFNULL( i.aja_autograph_time, '' ) AS ajaAutographTime, IFNULL( j.ajw_autograph_enclosure, '' ) AS ajwAutographEnclosure, IFNULL( j.ajw_autograph_time, '' ) AS ajwAutographTime, IFNULL( a.shenfenzhenghao, '' ) AS shenfenzhenghao, IFNULL( a.jiatingzhuzhi, '' ) AS jiatingzhuzhi, IFNULL( a.shoujihaoma, '' ) AS shoujihaoma, IFNULL( m.ajw_start_date, '' ) AS ajwStartDate, IFNULL( m.ajw_end_date, '' ) AS ajwEndDate, IFNULL( m.ajw_autograph_time, '' ) AS ajwAutographTime2, IFNULL( m.ajw_autograph_enclosure, '' ) AS ajwAutographEnclosure2,
IFNULL( l.cheliangpaizhao, '' ) AS cheliangpaizhao, IFNULL( l.avx_original_enclosure, '' ) AS avxOriginalEnclosure, IFNULL( l.avx_copy_enclosure, '' ) AS avxCopyEnclosure, IFNULL( l.avd_enclosure, '' ) AS avdEnclosure, IFNULL( l.avx_enclosure, '' ) AS avxEnclosure, IFNULL( l.avd_enclosure2, '' ) AS avdEnclosure2, IFNULL( k.cheliangpaizhao, '' ) AS cheliangpaizhaoGUA, IFNULL( k.avx_original_enclosure, '' ) AS avxOriginalEnclosureGUA, IFNULL( k.avx_copy_enclosure, '' ) AS avxCopyEnclosureGUA, IFNULL( k.avd_enclosure, '' ) AS avdEnclosureGUA, IFNULL( k.avx_enclosure, '' ) AS avxEnclosureGUA, IFNULL( k.avd_enclosure2, '' ) AS avdEnclosure2GUA FROM `anbiao_jiashiyuan` a LEFT JOIN anbiao_jiashiyuan_ruzhi b ON b.ajr_aj_ids = a.id LEFT JOIN anbiao_jiashiyuan_jiashizheng c ON c.ajj_aj_ids = a.id LEFT JOIN anbiao_jiashiyuan_congyezigezheng d ON d.ajc_aj_ids = a.id LEFT JOIN anbiao_jiashiyuan_tijian e ON e.ajt_aj_ids = a.id LEFT JOIN anbiao_jiashiyuan_gangqianpeixun f ON f.ajg_aj_ids = a.id LEFT JOIN anbiao_jiashiyuan_wuzezhengming g ON g.ajw_aj_ids = a.id INNER JOIN (
) h ON h.id = a.dept_id LEFT JOIN anbiao_jiashiyuan_anquanzerenshu i ON i.aja_aj_ids = a.id LEFT JOIN anbiao_jiashiyuan_weihaigaozhishu j ON j.ajw_aj_ids = a.id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT cheliangpaizhao, avx_original_enclosure, avx_copy_enclosure, l.avd_enclosure, avx_enclosure, n.avd_enclosure AS avd_enclosure2, jiashiyuanid FROM anbiao_vehicle j LEFT JOIN anbiao_vehicle_xingshizheng k ON j.id = k.avx_av_ids LEFT JOIN anbiao_vehicle_daoluyunshuzheng l ON j.id = l.avd_av_ids LEFT JOIN anbiao_vehicle_xingnengbaogao m ON j.id = m.avx_av_ids LEFT JOIN anbiao_vehicle_dengjizhengshu n ON j.id = n.avd_vehicle_ids WHERE j.cheliangpaizhao LIKE '%挂' AND j.is_deleted = 0 AND k.avx_delete = 0 AND l.avd_delete = 0 AND m.avx_delete = 0 AND n.avd_delete = 0 ) k ON a.id = k.jiashiyuanid LEFT JOIN ( SELECT cheliangpaizhao, avx_original_enclosure, avx_copy_enclosure, l.avd_enclosure, avx_enclosure, n.avd_enclosure AS avd_enclosure2, jiashiyuanid FROM anbiao_vehicle j LEFT JOIN anbiao_vehicle_xingshizheng k ON j.id = k.avx_av_ids LEFT JOIN anbiao_vehicle_daoluyunshuzheng l ON j.id = l.avd_av_ids LEFT JOIN anbiao_vehicle_xingnengbaogao m ON j.id = m.avx_av_ids LEFT JOIN anbiao_vehicle_dengjizhengshu n ON j.id = n.avd_vehicle_ids WHERE j.cheliangpaizhao NOT LIKE '%挂' AND j.is_deleted = 0 AND k.avx_delete = 0 AND l.avd_delete = 0 AND m.avx_delete = 0 AND n.avd_delete = 0 ) l ON a.id = l.jiashiyuanid LEFT JOIN anbiao_jiashiyuan_laodonghetong m on m.ajw_aj_ids=a.id WHERE a.isdelete = 0 AND b.ajr_delete = 0 AND c.ajj_delete = 0 AND d.ajc_delete = 0 AND e.ajt_delete = 0 AND f.ajg_delete = 0 AND g.ajw_delete = 0 AND i.aja_delete = 0 AND j.ajw_delete = 0 and m.ajw_delete = 0
and h.deptName like concat('%', #{deptName} ,'%')
-- AND a.id = '043f3cc2fdda266a07fa533ecba50e8e' GROUP BY a.id
